instruction: Compose a message to confirm a meeting
input:
Subject: Meeting with the Supplier 
Date and Time: Saturday, June 5 at 10 A.M.
Location: Zoom Meeting
output:
Dear Supplier,

This email is to confirm our Saturday, June 5th, 10 A.M. Zoom meeting to discuss our project.

See you then!

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
